Meadow-grass (Poa bulbosa) |regnum = Plantae |unranked_divisio = Angiosperms

The 'Pooideae' is a subfamily of the true grass family Poaceae. It includes some
major cereals such as wheat, barley, oat, rye and many lawn and pasture grasses.
